PrecisApproval of the exemption from the application of specified provisions of the Public Service Employment Act of certain appointments to positions in the DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WORKS AND GOVERNMENT SERVICES that are to be occupied by 47 former employees of the CANADA COMMUNICATION GROUP.

precis:
Approval of the exemption from the application of specified provisions of
the Public Service Employment Act of certain appointments to positions in
the DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WORKS AND GOVERNMENT SERVICES that are to be
occupied by 47 former employees of the CANADA COMMUNICATION GROUP.
